content.query:
CREATE TABLE [wwi_staging].[Sale]
 (
     [TransactionId] [uniqueidentifier]  NOT NULL,
     [CustomerId] [int]  NOT NULL,
     [ProductId] [smallint]  NOT NULL,
     [Quantity] [smallint]  NOT NULL,
     [Price] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
     [TotalAmount] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
     [TransactionDate] [int]  NOT NULL,
     [ProfitAmount] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
     [Hour] [tinyint]  NOT NULL,
     [Minute] [tinyint]  NOT NULL,
     [StoreId] [smallint]  NOT NULL
 )
 WITH
 (
     DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [CustomerId] ),
     CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
     PARTITION
     (
         [TransactionDate] RANGE RIGHT FOR VALUES (20100101, 20100201, 20100301, 20100401, 20100501, 20100601, 
                                                    20100701, 20100801, 20100901, 20101001, 20101101, 20101201, 
                                                    20110101, 20110201, 20110301, 20110401, 20110501, 20110601, 
                                                    20110701, 20110801, 20110901, 20111001, 20111101, 20111201, 
                                                    20120101, 20120201, 20120301, 20120401, 20120501, 20120601, 
                                                    20120701, 20120801, 20120901, 20121001, 20121101, 20121201, 
                                                    20130101, 20130201, 20130301, 20130401, 20130501, 20130601, 
                                                    20130701, 20130801, 20130901, 20131001, 20131101, 20131201, 
                                                    20140101, 20140201, 20140301, 20140401, 20140501, 20140601, 
                                                    20140701, 20140801, 20140901, 20141001, 20141101, 20141201, 
                                                    20150101, 20150201, 20150301, 20150401, 20150501, 20150601, 
                                                    20150701, 20150801, 20150901, 20151001, 20151101, 20151201, 
                                                    20160101, 20160201, 20160301, 20160401, 20160501, 20160601, 
                                                    20160701, 20160801, 20160901, 20161001, 20161101, 20161201, 
                                                    20170101, 20170201, 20170301, 20170401, 20170501, 20170601, 
                                                    20170701, 20170801, 20170901, 20171001, 20171101, 20171201, 
                                                    20180101, 20180201, 20180301, 20180401, 20180501, 20180601, 
                                                    20180701, 20180801, 20180901, 20181001, 20181101, 20181201, 
                                                    20190101, 20190201, 20190301, 20190401, 20190501, 20190601, 
                                                    20190701, 20190801, 20190901, 20191001, 20191101, 20191201)
     )
 )

-- Replace SUFFIX with the lab workspace id. 
DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ABSS]
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ABSS
WITH ( TYPE = HADOOP, 
       LOCATION = 'abfss://wwi-02@asadatalakem3hx41t.dfs.core.windows.net' );

 CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [ParquetFormat]
 WITH (
     FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
     DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
 )
 GO
 
 CREATE SCHEMA [wwi_external];
 GO
 
 CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [wwi_external].Sales
     (
         [TransactionId] [nvarchar](36)  NOT NULL,
         [CustomerId] [int]  NOT NULL,
         [ProductId] [smallint]  NOT NULL,
         [Quantity] [smallint]  NOT NULL,
         [Price] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
         [TotalAmount] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
         [TransactionDate] [int]  NOT NULL,
         [ProfitAmount] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
         [Hour] [tinyint]  NOT NULL,
         [Minute] [tinyint]  NOT NULL,
         [StoreId] [smallint]  NOT NULL
     )
 WITH
     (
         LOCATION = '/sale-small/Year=2019',  
         DATA_SOURCE = ABSS,
         FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFormat]  
     )  
 GO

INSERT INTO [wwi_staging].[SaleHeap] 
SELECT * FROM [wwi_external].[Sales]

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM [wwi_staging].[SaleHeap](nolock)

TRUNCATE TABLE [wwi_staging].[SaleHeap]

COPY INTO wwi_staging.SaleHeap
 FROM 'https://asadatalakem3hx41t.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi-02/sale-small/Year=2019'
 WITH (
     FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET',
     COMPRESSION = 'SNAPPY'
 )
 GO

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 CREATE TABLE [wwi_staging].DailySalesCounts
     (
         [Date] [int]  NOT NULL,
         [NorthAmerica] [int]  NOT NULL,
         [SouthAmerica] [int]  NOT NULL,
         [Europe] [int]  NOT NULL,
         [Africa] [int]  NOT NULL,
         [Asia] [int]  NOT NULL
     )
 GO
 
 -- Replace SUFFIX with the unique suffix for your resources
 COPY INTO wwi_staging.DailySalesCounts
 FROM 'https://asadatalakem3hx41t.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi-02/campaign-analytics/dailycounts.txt'
 WITH (
     FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
     FIELDTERMINATOR='.',
     ROWTERMINATOR=','
 )
 GO

SELECT * FROM [wwi_staging].DailySalesCounts
